mapper.update: update contest set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, defunct = #{defunct,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_private = #{isPrivate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, langmask = #{langmask,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where contest_id = #{contestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select contest_id, title, start_time, end_time, defunct, is_private, langmask, `password`, description from contest where contest_id = #{contestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select contest_id, title, start_time, end_time, defunct, is_private, langmask, `password`, description from contest
